name: Baba Ghanoush
description:
Nordic Game Jam 2023 submission based on:

- Thyme (The Spice)

- Ganesha (The Mythical Creature)

- Hard Water Resistance (The Physical Property)

Play together to collect as much thyme as possible before being interrupted.

Controls:

Press A/X on a controller to join the game

Use thumbsticks to control Ganeshas arms

A/X to drop thyme in the basket

Made By:

Colin

Nicolai

Kelsey

Jonas
